Combat
Hit Points: 87 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 17 Attacks Per Round: 2 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +7/+8/+10 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +8/19
Armor Proficiency: Light Shield Proficiency: None Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+10 d3 x2@20 R20'); Greataxe (+4 d10 x3@20); Heavy Mace (+8 d6 x2@20); Light Mace (+10 d4 x2@20); Unarmed (+10 d2 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Agile Maneuvers: +2 CMB
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +30
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Greataxe: -4 attack
Small: +1 AC/+1 Melee Attack/+1 Ranged Attack/-1 CMB/-1 CMD
Weapon Finesse: +2 light melee weapon attack (dex instead of str)
Bleeding Attack: Sneak attack causes extra 5 HP/rd until healed
Crippling Strike: 2 points Str damage from sneak attack
Defensive Training: +4 AC vs. giant creatures
Gnome Hatred: +1 attack vs. goblinoid and reptilian
Improved Sidestep: May move normally on next rd after Sidestep
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 14+
Knock-Out Blow: May forego sneak attack damage to inflict unconscious for 1d4 rd (DC 15 Fort staggered 1 rd)
Low Profile: +1 AC vs. ranged
Mobility: +4 AC vs. movement AOO
Sidestep: May move 5' w/in threatened area w/out AOO after foe miss; suffers -5' move next rd
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +5d6 HP when foe flanked or denied Dex bonus
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dex modifier to AC
Under And Over: May make immediate +2 trip maneuver w/no AOO after larger foe grapple fails
Underfoot: +2 AC vs. AOO from moving through larger foe threat area
Save: Fortitude: +6; Reflex: +9; Will: +4
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Resist Illusion: +2 vs. illusions

Prestidigitation (Gnome Magic0 Univ): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Prestidigitation (Gnome Trickster0 Univ): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr

Magic Notes:
Gnome Magic: +1 Spell DC (Illusion)/May cast Dancing Lights, Ghost Sound, Prestidigitation, and Speak With Animals 1/dy
Arcane Talent: May cast chosen level 0 spell 3/dy
Gnome Trickster: May cast Mage Hand and Prestidigitation 1/dy
Groundling: May use Speak With Animals w/burrowing animals at will
